scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist/js && cp src/*.html dist/ && cp -r src/css dist/ && cp -r src/public/* dist/ && cp node_modules/three/build/three.module.js dist/js/three.module.js && cp node_modules/gsap/dist/gsap.js dist/js/gsap.js && cp node_modules/scrollreveal/dist/scrollreveal.js dist/js/scrollreveal.js && esbuild 'src/js/**/*.ts' 'src/js/**/*.js' --outdir=dist/js --outbase=src/js --format=esm
